release.action: Software Evolution Matrix Chart has been added. It shows up the file size evolution between tagged versions.
BR tags have been replaced by DIV tags to work around weird jelly behaviour that inserts whitespaces between an opening and closing BR tag causing most browsers to print an additional line break.
All commit comments are wrapped in a CDATA element now to fix #1480.
A new report with a list of the most common commit comments has been added.
The misleading error message about a missing picture has been rephrased.
The handling of empty section names in the html output has been fixed. Empty sections headers are now omitted.
Exception in AuthorOfTheMonthReport has been fixed. Now the author with the most new lines in this month scores.
Complete customizability of the generated documents through an XML file has been implemented.
Grouping has been added to support easy parameterization of charts.
Scritability using Jexl to filter input and output values has been added.
The commit activity chart from StatCvs has been merged.
A document with recent activity has been added.
A report that list the author with the highest lines of code delta per month has been added.
The author page now support a picture of the author to be displayed.
History feature has been rewritten. Instead of calling cvs from StatCvs-XML it is required to check out all 1.1 revisions to a working directory prior to running StatCvs-XML.
The documentation has been updated.
The updated cvs log parsing code has been merged from StatCvs. This includes fixes for partial logs and for handling of logs generated by cvsnt.
Simplyfied stylesheet to support custom reports.
Version output has been fixed.
The headless property is now set to make JFreeChart work on machines without a graphical display.
First release based on StatCvs 0.13.
